articles.title: What's in Trump's trade agreement with the European Union? - ABC News
US-China talks restart as hopes grow for trade war truce extension - BBC
articles.description: The talks in Sweden to come hours after US President Donald Trump announced a deal with the European Union.
articles.content:
Osmond ChiaBusiness reporter, BBC News
The US and China have started a fresh round of talks as expectations grow that the world's two biggest economies could agree a 90-day extension to their trade … [+2493 chars]
